      • getFileStore

        public IFileStore getFileStore(String fileStoreId)
                        throws NoSuchFileStoreException
        Description copied from interface: IGramarPlatform
        Searches all known plugin sources for an extension that provides a filestore with the given filestore ID. Ask that extension for an instance of that filestare and return the instance.
        Specified by:
        getFileStore in interface IGramarPlatform
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoSuchFileStoreException

      • scoreKnownGramars

        public GramarScore[] scoreKnownGramars(IModel proposedModel)
        Specified by:
        scoreKnownGramars in interface IGramarPlatform
        Returns:
        a sorted array of gramars with associated scores. GramarScores are returned with the best match first and the worst match last.

      • getModelAdaptor

                              throws NoSuchModelAdaptorException
        Description copied from interface: IGramarPlatform
        Returns the IModelAdaptor implementation for the given adaptor ID. If no such model adaptor is supported by this extension then throw an exception
